lead_paragraph: WEIS--Kevin G.,78, of Manhattan, NY, passed away April 11, 2016. He was a graduate of St. Vincent Preparatory High School, the University of Pittsburgh, and Harvard Business School. He retired as Vice President of Finance at Chase Bank. Services private. The Lynch-Radkowski FH, Inc., St. Marys, PA. Condolences may be offered at www.lynch-radkowski.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEIS, KEVIN G.
